title: InuYasha Movie 4: Fire on the Mystic Island
alternative_title: InuYasha: Guren no Houraijima, 犬夜叉 紅蓮の蓬莱島
description: The island of Hourai, controlled by four demon gods. A girl who knows Inuyasha appears: "Ai." Unchanged for fifty years, what is this girl's secret? When the cursed seal comes to the surface, it begins Inuyasha and Sesshoumaru's newest battle!
genre: [<Genre -> Adventure>, <Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Demons>, <Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Historical>, <Genre -> Romance>, <Genre -> Shounen>, <Genre -> Supernatural>]
